localised_text.tooltip_text: Force loses battle by killing all your units (must finish deployment first!)
Force wins battle by killing all enemy units (must finish deployment first!)

disembark_timer.componentleveltooltip: The enemy's control of the land is disheartening your men! If you do not disembark and engage soon, your forces will begin to break and flee!

dy_score.componentleveltooltip: Score for current battle. Gain a higher score to obtain greater awards and unlock Daemon Prince parts. Score is gained by causing damage to enemies.

callback_with_context.context_function_id: IsLegendaryMode == false && AllianceList.Size <= 2 && IsDomination == false && IsSurvival == false && IsTrial == false

outnumbered_timer.componentleveltooltip: Your men are outnumbered and are becoming increasingly worried about their chances!

component_text.text: Your men are outnumbered! Morale penalty:
